body_html:
@alykhantejani @nishnik, i have add my pytorchpath(home/*/pytorch-master) to ~/.bashrc and /etc/profile, but i also encounter the same error.
@soumith ,the full error is like this:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/*/pytorch-master/densenet_hourglass/inter_loss.py", line 7, in <module>
    model = models.densenet121()
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/torchvision/models/densenet.py", line 25, in densenet121
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/torchvision/models/densenet.py", line 128, in __init__
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 233, in __init__
    False, _pair(0), groups, bias)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 32, in __init__
    out_channels, in_channels // groups, *kernel_size))
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 252, in __setattr__
    self.register_parameter(name, value)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 95, in register_parameter
    elif param.creator:
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 63, in __getattr__
    raise AttributeError(name)
AttributeError: creator

thanks~

@soumith ,the full error is like this:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/*/pytorch-master/densenet_hourglass/inter_loss.py", line 7, in <module>
    model = models.densenet121()
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/torchvision/models/densenet.py", line 25, in densenet121

body:
@alykhantejani @nishnik, i have add my pytorchpath(home/*/pytorch-master) to ~/.bashrc and /etc/profile, but i also encounter the same error.
 @soumith ,the full error is like this:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/*/pytorch-master/densenet_hourglass/inter_loss.py", line 7, in <module>
    model = models.densenet121()
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/torchvision/models/densenet.py", line 25, in densenet121
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/torchvision/models/densenet.py", line 128, in __init__
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 233, in __init__
    False, _pair(0), groups, bias)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 32, in __init__
    out_channels, in_channels // groups, *kernel_size))
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 252, in __setattr__
    self.register_parameter(name, value)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 95, in register_parameter
    elif param.creator:
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 63, in __getattr__
    raise AttributeError(name)
AttributeError: creator
```
thanks~
